text: They are all despicable sinners and immoral lazy men. He was speaking to a group of villagers No man of this place will see the gates of Paradise! Are you sure? "I'm not going to tell you what I'm doing". Do whatever jokes you want, man! The preacher was furious because he doubted his words. You'll be the first to feel the flames of hell licking your boots! And where will you go after you die? Virtual believers like me will go straight to eternal Paradise. "In that case", Nasrudin calmly replied, "it's better I go to hell with my friends and relatives". I'd rather tell jokes to keep them entertained than have to live with maniacs like you forever. FIN
title: Preferencias escatológicas
author: nan Anónimo
